title: Keir Starmer – 2023 Statement Following Death of Clare Drakeford
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 28 January 2023.
content:
I’m deeply shocked and saddened to hear of the sudden passing of Clare Drakeford.
